snippet.title: Firebug easy level walkthrough (Apple II - MUSE)
snippet.description:
Firebug (https://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/firebug) was an action game published by MUSE software in 1982 for the Apple ][. The player's objective is to burn down each of the five floors of a building by knocking over or placing gas cans. Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The game was written by Silas Warner, who also created Castle Wolfenstein.

Credits:
Disk image - 4AM
